DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the long-term results after recanalization of coronary chronic total occlusions.
DOC.brief_title: Coronary and Structural Interventions Ulm - Coronary Chronic Total Occlusions
DOC.detailed_description: Patients with successful recanalization of coronary chronic total occlusions are followed during a period of 5 years to demonstrate safety and efficacy.
DOC.criteria: coronary artery disease chronic total occlusion no written informed consent
